title: Who are some of your favorite anime writers on Quora in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Personally I’d like to name a few so far. James Pizarro is an amazing Naruto writer. Very informative, straight to the point, and answers things frequently. Very highly quality simple answers.  Next I wanna say Ryan Pennywell. His Naruto and Bleach crossover is arguably my favorite series on all of Quora. It’s very well written and adds more adult actions like cursing which makes more sense. He is also very consistent. And even if one chapter doesn’t get as many upvotes, he keeps going and makes the next one better. It’s insane dedication 🤯  Next is my man Kenroy Paddyfoot, Kenroy has some of, if not the best Bleach analytics on this platform. It’s like when he writes an answer he always does extra. It’s amazing. I may have finished Bleach, but I can’t understand half the things he can.  Another amazing writer is Jesse McCammon. Extremely quality answers. Just like James Pizarro. Short, straight to point answers for when you have a My Hero Academia question. He understands the show in a way I can’t.  Next is Mate Pavić. Probably the best One Piece related writer on Quora. You can tell he actually knows what he’s talking about and he’s good at showing it. All around great writer definitely check him out.  Jason Murphy is another great Naruto writer who has amazing high quality answers. His analysis’s are great and he puts time into his answers and they come out very nicely!  There are way too many writers for me too name who I love so don’t get butthurt. Some honourable mentions: Nicolas Black, Thomas White, Akiro Laxus, Michael J. Elijah, Jonny Dee
